getInstance().Description: Retrieves a singleton instance of Configurator.

getScrollAcknowledgmentTimeout().Description: Gets the timeout for waiting for an acknowledgement of an uiautomtor scroll swipe action. The acknowledgment is an @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#UiScrollable_E@

setKeyInjectionDelay(long).Description: Sets a delay between key presses when injecting text input. See @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#UiObject#setText_E@

getWaitForIdleTimeout().Description: Gets the current timeout used for waiting for the user interface to go into an idle state. By default, all core uiautomator objects except @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#UiDevice_E@ will perform this wait before starting to search for the widget specified by the object's @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#UiSelector_E@. Once the idle state is detected or the timeout elapses (whichever occurs first), the object will start to wait for the selector to find a match. See @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#Configurator#setWaitForSelectorTimeout_E@

setWaitForSelectorTimeout(long).Description: Sets the timeout for waiting for a widget to become visible in the user interface so that it can be matched by a selector. Because user interface content is dynamic, sometimes a widget may not be visible immediately and won't be detected by a selector. This timeout allows the uiautomator framework to wait for a match to be found, up until the timeout elapses.

getKeyInjectionDelay().Description: Gets the current delay between key presses when injecting text input. See @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#UiObject#setText_E@

getActionAcknowledgmentTimeout().Description: Gets the current timeout for waiting for an acknowledgment of generic uiautomator actions, such as clicks, text setting, and menu presses. The acknowledgment is an @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#UiObject_E@

getWaitForSelectorTimeout().Description: Gets the current timeout for waiting for a widget to become visible in the user interface so that it can be matched by a selector. Because user interface content is dynamic, sometimes a widget may not be visible immediately and won't be detected by a selector. This timeout allows the uiautomator framework to wait for a match to be found, up until the timeout elapses.

setToolType(int).Description: Sets the current tool type to use for motion events.

setActionAcknowledgmentTimeout(long).Description: Sets the timeout for waiting for an acknowledgment of generic uiautomator actions, such as clicks, text setting, and menu presses. The acknowledgment is an @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#UiObject_E@

setWaitForIdleTimeout(long).Description: Sets the timeout for waiting for the user interface to go into an idle state before starting a uiautomator action. By default, all core uiautomator objects except @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#UiDevice_E@ will perform this wait before starting to search for the widget specified by the object's @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#UiSelector_E@. Once the idle state is detected or the timeout elapses (whichever occurs first), the object will start to wait for the selector to find a match. See @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#Configurator#setWaitForSelectorTimeout_E@

setScrollAcknowledgmentTimeout(long).Description: Sets the timeout for waiting for an acknowledgement of an uiautomtor scroll swipe action. The acknowledgment is an @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#UiScrollable_E@

getToolType().Description: Gets the current tool type to use for motion events.

ClassDesc: Allows you to set key parameters for running uiautomator tests. The new settings take effect immediately and can be changed any time during a test run. To modify parameters using Configurator, first obtain an instance by calling @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#Configurator#getInstance_E@. As a best practice, make sure you always save the original value of any parameter that you are modifying. After running your tests with the modified parameters, make sure to also restore the original parameter values, otherwise this will impact other tests cases.
